Name: Iced Sake Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with cucumber slices floated on surface.
Review: Icewine adds interesting and wonderfully subtle honeyed notes to this Sake Martini.
History: Created in 2004 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Iced Sake Martini contains 185 calories
